title: [Large-scale] Blended Learning-Based Microlearning Program for Clinical Skills Education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Medical Terminology and Basic Patient Care Procedures
context.additional_context: Optimizing smartphone-based learning in limited technological environments, enhancing visual materials to overcome language barriers

learning_goals: Learners can demonstrate five core clinical skills (blood pressure measurement, wound care, basic examination performance, etc.) with ≥80% accuracy.
Learners can improve emergency situation judgment skills by ≥70% through simulation-based mobile modules.
Learners submit team-developed clinical scenario reports in project-based assessments and achieve ≥4.0/5.0 through peer evaluation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
